title: Reposition quarter timer and control buttons

requirements.text: Move the quarter control buttons (Start, Pause, Reset, Next Quarter) from their current location to the same position as the point section controls in the broadcaster interface

quotes: put the quarter buttons in the same pllace as the point section

acceptanceCriteria: Quarter control buttons appear in the same layout area as the point tracking controls
Both control sections maintain visual consistency and alignment
All buttons remain fully functional after repositioning

requirements.text: Reposition the quarter timer display to appear at the top-left corner of the camera video feed (on the video overlay itself)

quotes: make the quarter timer at the top left of the camera

acceptanceCriteria: Quarter timer appears overlaid on the video feed at the top-left position
Timer remains visible and readable throughout the broadcast
Timer position does not interfere with other video overlays

constraints: Do not modify the quarter timer functionality (6:00 countdown, Start/Pause/Reset/Next Quarter behavior, Halftime mode)
Maintain all existing scoreboard and event features
nonGoals: Changing quarter timer duration or behavior
Altering scoreboard or event tracking functionality
